page.index.pageTitle: Cursify - AI that creates your content
page.index.firstLiner.punchline: AI that generates your content in seconds
page.index.firstCase.explaination: Facebook Ad ? Blog Intro ? Product Description ? We have more than 40 categories.
page.index.secondCase.explaination: What do you want the AI to talk about ? Give it a few words to show it the way.
page.index.thirdCase.explaination: AI generates creative and relevant text based on what you entered. You can directly copy it and use it !
page.index.thirdLiner.slogan: Give a few words. Let the AI do the rest.
page.index.thirdLiner.explaination: Cursify uses technology based on AI. Thanks to Deep Learning, it is able to make connections that have never been done before. With just a few words, it can create specific text just for you.
page.index.fourthLiner.explaination: Words are automatically generated thanks to the Deep Learning algorithm. Creative and relevant marketing text are generated for you on the fly.
page.index.fifthLiner.title: Try it now for free
page.index.fifthLiner.button.title: Get Started

categories.id1.label: Describe shortly your product
categories.id1.placeholder: Example : Data analytics software for small and medium businesses.
categories.id1.description: Create a description that will present your product with ease.
categories.id2.description: Offer a rich and relevant presentation of your service.
categories.id2.label: What is your company/product name ?
categories.id2.placeholder2: Example : We connect drivers to people who wants to go somewhere.
categories.id3.description: Create a blog title that will summarize the key idea of your text.
categories.id3.label: What is this blog ticket about ?
categories.id4.description: Create a unique caption for your Instagram caption.
categories.id4.label: What is your caption about ?
categories.id4.placeholder: Example : Went to the beach yesterday - it was so beautiful.
categories.id5.description: Introduce your blog with the relevant outlines.
categories.id5.label: What is your blog about ?
categories.id5.placeholder: Example : My blog is about cooking specific pizzas !
categories.id6.description: Create relevant stories that will engage your customers.
categories.id6.placeholder: Generate scroll-topping headlines for your Facebook Ads to get prospects to click, and ultimately buy.
